title: B. Network Agreements and Consent
points: Data that you consent to provide to us will be governed by this agreement and the Terms and Conditions of Use between you and the Company regarding your use of the Network. Except with respect to Network visitors invited by a current Network user, we do not record the names or email addresses of visitors who do not register as Network users unless such users subscribe to receive information via electronic mail.

In certain instances, providing specific personal information may be essential for us to grant you access to and enable your use of the Network. If you choose not to provide such required information when requested, you may be restricted from accessing or using certain features or functionalities of the Network.
